title: leporelo
author: leporelo
content: Hello I am offering to buy your crypto (usdt, btc and xmr) for cash. I am availible in Germany (Stuttgart), France (Paris) and Spain (Barcelona, Madrid, Benidorm).Procedure: We meet in public place, after we check and count cash, you send crypto. We wait for enough confirmations on blockchain and then transaction ends.Trustability: I prefer to start with smaller amount to build confidence. If you want I can send links/screens with reviews.Commission: Depends on amount. I usually buy at 3.5% under market price. For that you get professional service without unnecessary questions.Please dont contact me, if your intentions is to scam or rob people. I have enough experience with all kind of these people, so you would only waste my time.Contact: Signal: +14502350400 / Telegram: LEPORELO / Nothing else! Check every letter/number twice to avoid impersonators.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: No no no no, you don't buy for 3.5% under the market price. It's the opposite, you do not have people launder your money and make them pay a fee for doing so.

comments.author: CryptoRollaOTC
comments.body: Beware of cash deals, they don't end well 99% of the time. Also this trick of "gaining trust" is very often used by the scammers, they always mention it. It's pure RED flag.https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-12-09/crypto-scammers-allegedly-lured-victims-with-cases-of-fake-cash

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoRollaOTC on April 01, 2023, 08:29:04 PMBeware of cash deals, they don't end well 99% of the time. Also this trick of "gaining trust" is very often used by the scammers, they always mention it. It's pure RED flag.https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-12-09/crypto-scammers-allegedly-lured-victims-with-cases-of-fake-cash99% of time.. i guess yourself never even tried a IRL deal.

Also this trick of "gaining trust" is very often used by the scammers, they always mention it. It's pure RED flag.https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-12-09/crypto-scammers-allegedly-lured-victims-with-cases-of-fake-cash99% of time.. i guess yourself never even tried a IRL deal.    Never, but seems like statistic expert while cant use inverse implication.Scammers use cash only =/= people using cash are scammers only
